text: Egha Jonatan uan mɨdorozir gumaziba ko, me Geban nguibamɨn averpenibar itir Filistian mɨdorozir gumazibav sogha me abɨni. Ezɨ Filistian igharaz darazi me arazir kamɨn akam baregha puvɨra Israelian atari. Ezɨ Sol bizir kam bagha gumaziba amadazɨ, me Israelian ikɨziba bar dar ghua sɨghabagh ivia, mɨdorozimɨn uabɨn akurvaghasa gumazibar dei.
